text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump That’s nice.

Where were they two months ago?

Where was Trump during the entire month of February?

Why do we STILL lag in available testing even as of today?

Save your propaganda.

We KNOW the facts.

And they are damning.

#COVID19
#FireTrump
